full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` YE SHES KYI MKHA' 'GRO MA SENGGE'I GDONG CAN GYI TSOGS MCHOD 'KHYER BDE BZHUGS SO,, ,,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002B (CES YE SHES KYI MKHA' 'GRO MA SENGGE'I GDONG CAN GYI TSOGS MCHOD 'KHYER BDE BA 'DI YANG CHO GA DANG 'BREL NA SPYAN 'DAN ZUR DU MA BYAS KYANG CHOG CING, ,BYAS KYANG PHUN SUM TSOGS PA'I YAN LAG YIN PAS 'GAL MIN 'DUG PAS BREL STABS DANG BSTUN NAS RGYAS BSDUS SKABS DANG SBYAR, ,'DI NI RAB BYUNG ZHES PA ME YOS SA GA ZLA BA'I YAR TSES BZANG POR DPAL LDAN BKRA SHIS SGO MANG GI DGE 'DUN BSNYEN SONG NYI SHU RTZA GCIG GIS 'DI'I GTOR BZLOG DANG ZOR 'PHEN DGOS PA'I SKABS SU, SAm GHAMAH'A SU KHAS PHYOGS GCIG TU BSGRIGS PA'O, ,) BKRA SHIS BAR GYUR CIG ` `DGE'O,, ,,)
